screen:
-= Info about function 'CALLERID' =-
[Syntax] CALLERID(datatype[,<optional-CID>])
[Synopsis] Gets or sets Caller*ID data on the channel.
[Description] Gets or sets Caller*ID data on the channel. The allowable datatypes are "all", "name", "num", "ANI", "DNID", "RDNIS", "pres", and "ton". Uses channel callerid by default or optional callerid, if specified.
